topic.title: Vital Signs Section (entries required) (V3) - conformance rules

section.p:
The Vital Signs Section contains relevant vital signs for the context and use case of the document type, such as blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, height, weight, body mass index, head circumference, pulse oximetry, temperature, and body surface area. The section should include notable vital signs such as the most recent, maximum and/or minimum, baseline, or relevant trends.
Vital signs are represented in the same way as other results, but are aggregated into their own section to follow clinical conventions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7273, CONF:1198-10452, CONF:1198-32585 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Vital Signs Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32874)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15962)/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15963, CONF:1198-30903)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-9967)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7275)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7276, CONF:1198-15964)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:
Conforms to Vital Signs Organizer2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Vital Signs Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4)
SHALL conform to Vital Signs Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32874)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15962)/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15963, CONF:1198-30903)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-9967)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7275)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7271, CONF:1198-15517)
Conforms to Vital Signs Organizer2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7276, CONF:1198-15964)
Conforms to Vital Signs Organizer2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26:2015-08-01)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" nullFlavor="NI"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <code code="8716-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Vital Signs"/> <title>Vital Signs</title> <text>EmjsLp SIuclq AXUcOhOa xNuFDKesO HwWizwUUJ XQtcm KRKYRP GUsitna LGBRWzQle QqznRtQJU jBTsQ TZsvbSU kbDoamWT sLFBcYC IJxPPiUx wEUomNsya IoFMIrC BlJYl yfHgUX Xpoik FSAhn LwvoM KPoMeDgC PaszrHs hMKLmD zsdmTZeAl TKOJv ncDkaMqKf fnypltJj LoMGTsals fUfyBppMX WMEMAsIw rXeTLsxga EJUIykTim OFnnCPQiC hXkTBn qQEOU CmcXqAUr KqCHmZCU fTQlpp dpciQrVJS HmUFDJcte PIIMSqsYc ysvYWqCk UEosBVHmF RCZrGH lqpAUcjlG vHGwDf fCkXWX qpxcHEiXH mqVJBIs XiisEPS Xvern NZfegosB YqewJMunY EPFzcM YbkjR tMemC jPKQFabJ CoouY OvrlJz TfNmv MQSQJUlIE AZTInm WFfrPUFpA SsCljW fMNFfwmk lSlfk dFkVI TpffxOqz ISmSHIbRA snuLXLVVO IYrYN HeDiJd dztGQ rligiofZ nhZdPVlE nGIfK yfCRzKDdm WSNtPy SWMWMzAF CiKMTJI </text> </section>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7273, CONF:10452 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1"
SHALL conform to Vital Signs Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4)
Consol Vital Signs Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15962)/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15963)
Consol Vital Signs Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7275)

Consol Vital Signs Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:7276, CONF:7277) Conforms to Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26)
Consol Vital Signs Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:9967)
